item.title: 早间竞价：各国央行静待利率上调，PMI将唱主角
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 中国联想集团延续收入增长势头，业绩超出预期
item.description: 中国联想集团周四公布第四季度营收增长9%，达到138亿美元，这家全球最大的个人电脑（PC）制造商摆脱了COVID-19疫情后的需求低迷。【原文：China's Lenovo Group reported a 9% rise in fourth-quarter revenue to $13.8 billion on Thursday, as the world's largest maker of personal computers (PCs) exits a demand slump following the aftermath of the COVID-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 独家报道微软与阿联酋的交易可能将美国的关键芯片和人工智能技术转移到国外
item.description: 微软总裁布拉德-史密斯（Brad Smith）表示，该科技公司与阿拉伯联合酋长国支持的人工智能公司G42的高调交易最终可能涉及精密芯片和工具的转让--一位共和党资深国会议员警告说，此举可能会对国家安全产生影响。【原文：Microsoft President Brad Smith said the tech company's high profile deal with the United Arab Emirates-backed AI firm G42 could eventually involve the transfer of sophisticated chips and tools - a move that a senior Republican congressman warned could have national security implications.】

item.title: 韩国宣布 190 亿美元芯片产业支持计划
item.description: 韩国总统办公室表示，韩国周四宣布了一项 26 万亿韩元（约合 190 亿美元）的一揽子计划，以支持该国至关重要的半导体产业。【原文：South Korea announced on Thursday a 26 trillion won ($19 billion) support package for the country's vital semiconductor industry, the country's presidential office said.】

item.title: 台积电预计半导体行业年销售额增长将达 10
item.description: 苹果和 Nvidia 的主要供应商、台湾合约芯片制造商台积电周四预测，除存储芯片外，全球半导体行业的年收入将增长 10%。【原文：Taiwanese contract chipmaker TSMC , a major supplier to Apple and Nvidia , on Thursday forecast an annual revenue growth of 10% in the global semiconductor industry, excluding memory chips.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因耐心等待降息而走弱
item.description: 周四，亚洲几个主要股票基准指数下跌，因为市场正在消化主要经济体的政策制定者在通胀胶着的情况下倾向于采取耐心的宽松货币政策所带来的影响。【原文：Several key Asian share benchmarks fell on Thursday as markets digested the implications of policymakers in major economies preferring to take patient approach to monetary easing amid sticky inflation.】

item.title: 新加坡航空公司股价在动荡航班后下跌 1.3
item.description: 周四早盘，新加坡航空公司股价下跌超过1%，此前该公司一架航班因气流造成严重损失。【原文：Singapore Airlines shares fell more than 1% in early trade on Thursday, following a deadly turbulence-hit flight.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要偏鹰派，美元徘徊在一周最高点附近
item.description: 在美联储上次会议纪要显示部分官员有加息意愿后，美元兑主要货币汇率周四徘徊在一周高点附近，创下本月最佳表现。【原文：The dollar hovered near a one-week high on Thursday following its best day this month against its major peers after minutes of the last Federal Reserve meeting revealed a willingness to raise interest rates among some officials.】

item.title: 亚马逊与人工智能初创公司 "Hugging Face "合作使用亚马逊芯片
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）云计算部门周三表示，它已与人工智能初创公司Hugging Face合作，使在亚马逊定制计算芯片上运行数千个人工智能模型变得更加容易。【原文：Amazon.com's cloud unit on Wednesday said it has partnered with artificial intelligence startup Hugging Face to make it easier to run thousands of AI models on Amazon's custom computing chips.】

item.title: 英美资源集团拒绝第三项提议，延长竞购截止日期，必和必拓股价下跌
item.description: 澳大利亚必和必拓集团（BHP Group）股价周四下跌超过 3%，一天前，该公司的竞争对手英美资源集团（Anglo American）拒绝了必和必拓的第三次收购提议，并同意将提出有约束力收购提议的最后期限延长一周。【原文：Shares of Australia's BHP Group fell over 3% on Thursday, a day after smaller rival Anglo American rejected its third takeover proposal and agreed to a one-week extension for the deadline to make a binding offer.】

item.title: 油价因担心美国利率上升而下跌
item.description: 周四，油价连续第四天下跌，原因是人们担心，如果通胀飙升，美国借贷成本可能会再次上调，此举可能会损害石油需求。【原文：Oil prices eased for a fourth straight day on Thursday on worries that U.S. borrowing costs could be hiked again if inflation surged, a move that could hurt oil demand.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数显示日本工厂活动一年来首次扩张
item.description: 周四的一项商业调查显示，日本 5 月份的工厂活动出现了一年来的首次扩张，制造业在经历了数月的疲软之后开始加快步伐。【原文：Japan's factory activity crept into expansion for the first time in a year in May, a business survey showed on Thursday, as manufacturing gathered pace after months of weakness.】

item.title: 美国拜登政府表示支持独立的美联储
item.description: 上个月有报道称，共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正在评估如何对美国货币政策实施更多控制，拜登政府周三声称支持独立的美联储。【原文：The Biden administration asserted its support for an independent Federal Reserve on Wednesday, after a report surfaced last month that Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump is assessing ways to exercise more control over U.S. monetary policy.】

item.title: 波音公司在氦气泄漏调查中将 "星际客机 "首次载人发射日期定为 6 月 1 日
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）和波音公司周三表示，由于工程师们正在调查氦气泄漏的原因，并研究氦气泄漏会如何影响任务的关键部分，该公司将于6月1日首次载人发射 "星际客机"（Starliner）航天器。【原文：NASA and Boeing are targeting June 1 for the company's first crewed launch of its Starliner spacecraft as engineers investigate the cause of a helium leak and examine how it could affect crucial parts of the mission, the agency said Wednesday.】

item.title: 前景改善，新加坡实现 18 个月来最快增长
item.description: 新加坡政府周四公布的数据显示，2024 年第一季度新加坡经济同比增长 2.7%，创下 18 个月以来的最快增速。【原文：Singapore's economy grew 2.7% year-on-year in the first quarter of 2024, the quickest pace in 18 months, data showed on Thursday as the government said it expected manufacturing and trade-related sectors to improve over the course of 2024.】

item.title: 桥水聘请中国区主管阿尔伯特监管新投资部门
item.description: 布里奇沃特联合咨询公司（Bridgewater Associates）提升其中国区总经理乔安娜-阿尔伯特（Joanna Alpert）为新近成立的业务部门负责人，该部门主要负责管理和创造新的投资产品。【原文：Bridgewater Associates has promoted Joanna Alpert, its China general manager, as head of a recently launched business unit focused on managing and creating new investment products.】

item.title: 新加坡电信年度利润减少一半以上，减值支出达 23 亿美元
item.description: 受31亿新元（23.0亿美元）减值费用的影响，新加坡电信周四公布的全年净利润下降了64%，其中大部分与移动网络运营部门Optus有关。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications posted a 64% drop in full-year net profit on Thursday hit by a S$3.1 billion ($2.30 billion) impairment charge, majority of which relates to its mobile network operation unit Optus.】

item.title: 沃尔玛将在 5 年内向危地马拉投资 7 亿美元
item.description: 沃尔玛中美洲负责人周三表示，该公司计划在未来五年内在危地马拉投资约 7 亿美元。【原文：Walmart plans to invest some $700 million in Guatemala over the next five years, the company's Central America head said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 前花旗银行员工称因拒绝向监管机构提供虚假数据被解雇
item.description: 花旗集团一名前董事总经理周三起诉了该银行及其首席运营官，称她因反对向监管机构提供虚假信息而被解雇。【原文：A former managing director at Citigroup sued the bank and its chief operating officer on Wednesday, alleging she was fired for opposing what she said were attempts to give regulators false information.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 旗下 TNT 电视台与 ESPN 就大学橄榄球季后赛签订协议
item.description: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 旗下的 TNT 电视网与华特迪士尼旗下的 ESPN 签订了一份为期五年的协议，从即将到来的大学橄榄球赛季开始转播部分大学橄榄球季后赛。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery's TNT network has signed a five-year deal with Walt Disney-owned ESPN to broadcast select College Football Playoff games, starting from the upcoming college football season.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国司法部将寻求解散 Live Nation
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，美国司法部和一些州将起诉 Live Nation Entertainment 公司违反反垄断法，并可能寻求包括解散该公司在内的补救措施。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice and a group of states will sue Live Nation Entertainment for antitrust violations and could seek remedies including breaking up the company, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 沃尔格林进一步削减在药品分销商 Cencora 的股份
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance）与 Cencora 公司周三表示，沃尔格林博姿联盟向 Cencora 公司回售了价值 4 亿美元的药品分销商股份，进一步将其持股比例从约 13% 降至约 12%。【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance sold $400 million worth of shares in drug distributor Cencora back to the company, further lowering its stake to about 12% from about 13%, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价下一个是韩国银行，下一个是英伟达
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 英伟达强劲业绩预期提振人工智能芯片制造商股价
item.description: 周三收盘后，英伟达（Nvidia NVDA.O）的营收预期强于预期，提振了这家人工智能芯片制造商的股价，并推动了其他芯片和科技股的上涨。【原文：A stronger-than-expected revenue forecast from Nvidia NVDA.O after the bell on Wednesday lifted shares of the artificial-intelligence chipmaker and fueled gains in other chip and technology stocks.】

item.title: 杜邦将分拆为三家独立公司
item.description: 杜邦公司周三表示，它将分拆为三家上市公司，这使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 5%。【原文：DuPont said on Wednesday that it would separate into three publicly traded companies, sending its shares up 5% in extended trading.】

item.title: 由于需求下降，North Face 所有者 VF Corp 季度收入不及预期，并出现亏损
item.description: VF 公司周三公布第四季度业绩亏损，营收低于分析师预期，原因是旗下各品牌销售额下滑，反映出在消费者支出紧张的情况下，服装和鞋类需求不振。【原文：VF Corp posted a fourth-quarter loss and reported revenue below analysts' estimates on Wednesday as sales declined across its brands, reflecting choppy demand for its apparel and footwear amid strained consumer spending.】

item.title: 重量级人工智能公司英伟达（Nvidia）预计季度营收高于预期
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周三预测第二季度营收将超过预期，并押注于采用人工智能技术的企业对其行业领先芯片的巨大需求。【原文：Nvidia forecast second-quarter revenue above estimates on Wednesday, betting on insatiable demand for its industry-leading chips from businesses adopting artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 山姆-奥特曼的 OpenAI 公司与新闻集团签署内容协议
item.description: 山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）领导的 OpenAI 公司与媒体集团新闻集团（News Corp）周三表示，双方已签署协议，OpenAI 将可以访问新闻集团旗下一些最大的新闻出版物的内容。【原文：Sam Altman-led OpenAI has signed a deal that will give it access to content from some of the biggest news publications owned by media conglomerate News Corp , the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 尽管第四季度业绩向好，但 Elf Beauty 预计全年销售额和利润低于预期
item.description: 精灵美容公司（Elf Beauty）周三预计的年度销售额和利润低于华尔街的预期，这表明通胀严重已使美国人在化妆品和护肤品等平价奢侈品上的消费空间变得很小。【原文：Elf Beauty projected annual sales and profit below Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, in a sign that sticky inflation has left little room for Americans to spend on affordable luxuries such as cosmetic and skincare products.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，波音向中国的交付因国家监管机构的审查而推迟
item.description: 一位熟悉此事的消息人士告诉路透社，由于中国监管部门对驾驶舱语音记录器相关电池的审查，波音公司最近几周推迟了向中国交付飞机。【原文：Boeing's plane deliveries to China have been delayed in recent weeks due to a Chinese regulatory review of batteries related to the cockpit voice recorder, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.】
